data.prayer: Father, make bold the prophets in Baie Lazare, Seychelles so that the church can be equipped with truth and insight and a vision of your heart.
data.verse: These are the things which you should do: speak the truth to one another; judge with truth and judgment for peace in your gates.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Baie Lazare, Seychelles
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Jesus, you are the great high priest, please make the 278 believers in Baie Lazare, Seychelles a worthy priesthood under you.
data.verse: Since then we have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus, the Son of God, let us hold fast our confession.

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage those who are afraid in Baie Lazare, Seychelles that you are the healer and you are the Savior.
data.verse: Heal me, Lord, and I will be healed; save me and I will be saved, for you are the one I praise.

data.prayer: Spirit, guide the 278 believers in the state of Baie Lazare into all truth as they interpret Scriptures.
data.verse: For the word of God is alive and active. Sharper than any double-edged sword, it penetrates even to dividing soul and spirit, joints and marrow;

data.prayer: Father, move the 278 believers in the state of Baie Lazare to say "Not our will, but yours be done", like Jesus.
data.verse: He withdrew about a stone’s throw beyond them, knelt down and prayed, "Father, if you are willing, take this cup from me; yet not my will, but yours be done."

data.prayer: Jesus, like with the centurion who came to you for his sick servant, please call into your house those who have great faith but are not yet yours in the state of Baie Lazare
data.verse: When Jesus heard these things, he marveled at him, and turning to the crowd that followed him, said, “I tell you, not even in Israel have I found such faith.” And when those who had been sent returned to the house, they found the servant well.

data.section_summary:
the state of Baie Lazare, Seychelles has a population of 4,000.

We estimate Baie Lazare has 278 people who might know Jesus, 3,569 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 153 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 14 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: God in Heaven, only you can and should appoint evangelists. Please, appoint and send more to Baie Lazare, Seychelles.
data.verse: And in the church God has appointed first of all apostles, second prophets, third teachers, then workers of miracles, and those with gifts of healing, helping, administration, and various tongues.
